mapper.insert: insert into T_ACCESSORIES (ACCE_ID, ITEM_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, UPLOAD_DATE, SHOW_AS_IMAGE, EMPLOYEEID, EMPLOYEENAME, FILETYPE, REALPATH, CHOOSEFILE, THUMB_PATH, IS_PIC, FJTYPE, FILE_PATH ) values (#{acceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSize,jdbcType=REAL}, #{uploadDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{showAsImage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{employeeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{choosefile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thumbPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isPic,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fjtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePath,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

update T_ACCESSORIES
